item.title: 由 Blackstone 支持的印度富人财富管理公司在迪拜开业
item.description: Blackstone 公司支持的 ASK Asset & Wealth Management Group 旗下的私人财富部门在迪拜开设了办事处，以满足印度富裕侨民和希望开发南亚国家市场的国际投资者的需求。【原文：The private wealth arm of Blackstone Inc.-backed ASK Asset & Wealth Management Group has opened a Dubai office to cater for the wealthy Indian diaspora and international investors looking to tap the South Asian country.】

item.title: 中国大型炼油企业抢购石油以避免制裁干扰
item.description: 中国的国有石油公司和大型私营炼油厂正在抢购来自中东和其他地区的原油货物，加快为可能出现的燃料供应中断做好准备，因为对俄罗斯和伊朗的制裁收紧有可能抑制近期的原油流动。【原文：China’s state oil companies and large private refiners are snapping up crude cargoes from the Middle East and elsewhere, hastening preparation for potential disruption in fuel supply as tighter sanctions on Russia and Iran threaten to curb near-term crude flows.】

item.title: 流动性增强在即，印度顶级基金大量购买短期债务
item.description: 印度最大的固定收益基金正在增加整个市场的仓位，为央行今年开始放松货币政策做准备。【原文：India’s biggest fixed-income funds are ramping up positions across the market as they prepare for the central bank to start easing monetary policy this year.】

item.title: 加密银行 Sygnum 募集 5800 万美元，跻身独角兽行列
item.description: 加密货币公司 Sygnum Bank AG 在一轮股权融资中筹集了 5800 万美元，使其估值突破了 10 亿美元大关。【原文：Crypto firm Sygnum Bank AG raised $58 million in an equity funding round, pushing its valuation past the $1 billion mark.】

item.title: 人民币贬值压力增大，中国银行面临现金紧张问题
item.description: 中国捍卫本国货币不受强势美元影响的决心与日俱增，加剧了国内的流动性紧缩，将关键的短期融资利率推升至一年多来的最高水平。【原文：China’s increasing determination to defend its currency against a strong dollar is worsening a liquidity squeeze in the country, pushing a key short-term funding rate to its highest level in more than a year.】

item.title: 削减降息押注，新西兰债券创两个月最大跌幅
item.description: 由于货币疲软和商业景气改善，新西兰储备银行下个月再次大幅降息的预期被削弱，新西兰债券创下两个月来最大跌幅。【原文：New Zealand bonds slumped the most in two months as currency weakness and improving business sentiment saw expectations of another large Reserve Bank of New Zealand interest rate cut next month trimmed.】

item.title: 据说 Grab 支持的超级银行考虑今年在雅加达上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼超级银行正在考虑首次公开募股，最快可能于今年在雅加达举行。【原文：Super Bank Indonesia is considering an initial public offering that may take place in Jakarta as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 I Squared Capital 即将对香港宽频提出收购要约
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，I Squared Capital 正逐步接近对香港宽带有限公司（HKBN Ltd. ）的收购要约，有可能引发与中国移动有限公司（China Mobile Ltd. ）对这家香港上市宽带提供商的竞购战。【原文：I Squared Capital is edging closer to a buyout offer for HKBN Ltd., people familiar with the situation said, potentially setting up a bidding war with China Mobile Ltd. for the Hong Kong-listed broadband provider.】

item.title: 通胀可能让特朗普 2.0 在开始前就夭折
item.description:

item.title: 欧盟技术负责人称波罗的海电缆受损不可能是意外
item.description: 欧盟新任数字主管亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）表示，波罗的海海底电缆屡遭破坏不可能完全是偶然的，因为该地区各国领导人正准备聚集一堂，参加专门讨论这一主题的北约峰会。【原文：The European Union’s new digital chief, Henna Virkkunen, suggested the repeated damage to undersea cables in the Baltic Sea couldn’t be fully accidental, as leaders from the region prepare to gather for a NATO summit devoted to the topic.】

item.title: 市场动荡后英国出售债券以衡量投资者胃口
item.description: 英国自上周市场动荡以来首次出售债券，这将表明投资者对金边债券的偏好。【原文：The UK is set to get an indication of investor appetite for gilts, with its first bond sale since turmoil gripped the market last week.】

item.title: 里夫斯的英国愿景面临市场余波带来的新危险
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将于周二在议会发表自英国遭受市场动荡以来的首次演讲，这也是本周工党领导层可能出现的几个闪光点之一。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will speak in Parliament for the first time on Tuesday since the UK was rocked by market turbulence, one of several potential flash-points for the Labour leadership this week.】

item.title: 南非经济将摆脱十年增长惰性
item.description: 据顶级分析师称，在经历了十多年的不景气之后，南非经济今年将在解决增长制约因素的措施和消费者支出增加的推动下步入上升通道。【原文：South Africa’s economy is set to forge an upward path this year after misfiring for more than a decade, boosted by steps to address growth constraints and higher consumer spending, according to top-ranked analysts.】

item.title: 高盛的斯耐德称中国经济刺激政策仍在等待中
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）亚太区（日本除外）总裁凯文-斯耐德（Kevin Sneader）表示，中国经济在去年下半年出现了一些增长势头，但中国政府是否会推出重大刺激措施来重振经济，高盛集团和客户都处于观望状态。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and clients are in a waiting mode to see if Chinese authorities push out major stimulus measures to revive the economy after seeing some momentum in the second half of last year, according to Kevin Sneader, president of Asia-Pacific ex-Japan at the bank.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格上涨，中国进口创纪录，需求有望增加
item.description: 在数据显示中国每年进口的炼钢原料达到创纪录水平且贸易顺差飙升之后，铁矿石又飙升至每吨 100 美元的门槛之上。【原文：Iron ore surged back above the $100-a-ton threshold after data showed China’s annual imports of the steel-making ingredient reached a record and its trade surplus soared.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官在北京反垄断调查和人工智能限制期间访华
item.description: 本周，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）将踏上中国之行，访问各大城市，而此时中国政府正在调查该公司在国内的业务，华盛顿也在对其人工智能芯片的海外销售施加新的限制。【原文：Nvidia Corp. chief Jensen Huang is embarking on a trip to China this week, visiting major cities at a time Beijing is investigating his company’s domestic presence and Washington is slapping new curbs on the sale of its AI chips abroad.】

item.title: 特朗普关税报告令美元走软，铜价延续涨势
item.description: 铜价延续了今年的涨势，原因是有报道称即将上任的特朗普政府将缓慢提高贸易关税，而不是一次性征收巨额关税。【原文：Copper extended this year’s rally on a report the incoming Trump administration will slowly ramp up trade tariffs rather than impose sizable levies in one go.】

item.title: 台币将取代人民币成为亚洲第一大融资货币
item.description: 由于利率和货币波动风险较低，台币即将取代人民币成为亚洲最佳套利交易目标。【原文：The Taiwan dollar is on the verge of overtaking the yuan as Asia’s best carry-trade target given its lower risk of interest-rate and currency volatility.】

item.title: 据说阿波罗正在考虑天纳克印度公司以 20 亿美元的估值进行首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司正在考虑将汽车零部件供应商天纳克公司（Tenneco Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is considering listing auto-parts supplier Tenneco Inc.’s India business, people familiar with the matter said, joining others that have done or plan initial public offerings of their units in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 制药公司在美国举行大型会议，因医疗成本问题招致抗议
item.description: 制药业最大的投资会议周一在旧金山吸引了抗议者，他们举着写有 "拖延、否认、取证 "字样的牌子，检察官说这些字写在上个月一名医疗保险公司高管遇害现场发现的弹壳上。【原文：The pharmaceutical industry’s biggest investment conference drew protesters in San Francisco Monday with signs reading “delay, deny, depose,” words prosecutors said were written on shell casings found at the scene of a health insurance executive’s killing last month.】

item.title: 洛杉矶市政公用事业公司因帕利塞德大火缺水被起诉
item.description: 洛杉矶市的电力和供水公司遭到诉讼，指责其没有提供足够的水来扑灭这座美国第二大城市仍在肆虐的最大火灾。【原文：The city of Los Angeles’ electric and water utility was hit with a lawsuit faulting it for not supplying enough water to fight the biggest fire still raging in the second-largest US metropolis.】

item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Deadly wildfires in Los Angeles County will likely result in only a “modest drag” on US jobs growth, even as the blazes shape as one of the costliest natural disasters in US history, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 印度股市大跌使主要指数逼近超卖水平
item.description: 在油价上涨和卢比疲软使印度股票指数跌至七个月低点后，印度股票基准正接近一些投资者认为的超卖水平。【原文：India’s equity benchmark is approaching a level seen as oversold by some investors after rising oil prices and a weak rupee sent the gauge to a seven-month low.】

item.title: 高盛称中国将推出广泛刺激政策以抵消关税影响
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：China will use a broad range of stimulus measures to offset the effects of expected US tariffs and a persisting housing downturn, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 中国天然气增长放缓，廉价选择挤压需求
item.description: 经济增长放缓和更廉价的替代品可能会削弱中国对天然气的需求。【原文：A slowing economy and cheaper alternatives are likely to take the edge off China’s appetite for natural gas.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长称若前景实现将上调利率
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良造重申，如果其前景继续得到实现，央行将提高利率，同时补充说，国内外都存在需要关注的风险。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino reiterated that the central bank will raise rates if its outlook continues to be realized, while adding that there are risks both at home and abroad that require attention.】

item.title: TikTok 被禁用的风险让用户急于下载另外两款中国制造的应用程序
item.description: 小红书和柠檬8这两款中国制造的社交应用占据了美国苹果公司iPhone下载排行榜的前两位，因为在TikTok即将被禁之前，用户正在寻找替代品。【原文：A pair of Chinese-made social apps, Xiaohongshu and Lemon8, have taken over the top two positions on Apple Inc.’s iPhone download charts in the US as users seek out alternatives to TikTok ahead of an imminent ban.】
